content: Oh, I found the button, I have to go in src first
See the docs here that explain what happens when you press the button. It's a similar flow to the "edit file" button

github will automatically create a commit on your behalf and you can PR it to the original repository. It's supposed to be an in-browser easy version of deleting a directory in git and then creating a PR with that
So I think there is nothing to be afraid of
Martin Dvořák has marked this topic as resolved.
